biography.bio: Cornelia Froboess was born on October 28, 1943 in Wriezen, Brandenburg, Germany. She is an actress, known for Veronika Voss (1982), Paradis express (1997) and Angst hat eine kalte Hand (1996). She has been married to Hellmuth Matiasek since August 3, 1967. They have two children.
biography.name: Cornelia Froboess

biography.bio: Matthias Habich was born on January 12, 1940 in Danzig, Germany. He is an actor, known for Downfall (2004), The Reader (2008) and Enemy at the Gates (2001).
biography.name: Matthias Habich

biography.placeOfBirth: Breslau, Silesia, Germany [now Wroclaw, Dolnoslaskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Peter Franke was born in 1941 in Breslau, Silesia, Germany. He is an actor, known for Rudi the Racing Pig (2008), Le miracle de Berne (2003) and Maria la maléfique (1993). He has been married to Donata Höffer since 1987. They have one child.
biography.name: Peter Franke

biography.bio: Lambert Hamel was born on June 7, 1940 in Ludwigshafen, Germany. He is known for his work on My Führer (2007), Martin Luther (1983) and Happy Birthday, Türke! (1992).
biography.name: Lambert Hamel

biography.bio: Anna Maria Sturm was born in Regensburg, Bavaria. She lives in Berlin. During her studies at the Otto Falckenberg Acting School in Munich, Anna Maria Sturm started playing her first roles at the Munich Kammerspiele, Munich's city theatre. She was discovered by the young film director Marcus H. Rosenmueller, with whom she developed an intensive collaboration. Sturm played the main character in Rosenmuellers coming-of-age movies 'Beste Zeit' / 'Good Times' (2007) and 'Beste Gegend' (2008), and she performs in his historical biography of the German dramatist Emanuel Schickaneder, 'Sommer der Gaukler' (2011). Anna Maria Sturm also appears in diverse price-winning television films and series, such as 'Die Hebamme' (2010) and 'Tatort: Nie wieder frei sein' (2010). In the TV-series 'Polizeiruf 110' she plays the young investigator Anna Burnhauser.
biography.name: Anna Maria Sturm

biography.bio: Ulrike Grote was born on July 8, 1963 in Bremen, West Germany. She is an actress and director, known for Die Kirche bleibt im Dorf - Die Serie (2013), Was wenn der Tod uns scheidet? (2008) and Die Kirche bleibt im Dorf (2012).
biography.name: Ulrike Grote

biography.bio: Elisabeth Schwarz was born on November 7, 1938 in Stuttgart, Germany. She is known for her work on The Baader Meinhof Complex (2008), Death Is My Trade (1977) and L'alouette (1966).
biography.name: Elisabeth Schwarz

biography.bio: Peter Meinhardt is an actor, known for Whisper - Libres comme le vent (2013), Eine halbe Ewigkeit (2011) and Was glücklich macht (2009).
biography.name: Peter Meinhardt

biography.bio: Oliver Törner was born in 1956. He is an actor, known for Stroppy Cow, Stubborn Ram (2015), Mein Sohn, der Klugscheißer (2016) and Eichmanns Ende (2010).
biography.name: Oliver Törner

biography.bio: Martin Becker was born on July 22, 1962 in Breisach, Baden-Württemberg, West Germany. He is an actor, known for L'innocent (1993), Eine halbe Ewigkeit (2011) and Frankensteins Schwiegermutter (1983).
biography.name: Martin Becker

biography.bio: Liv Lisa Fries was born on October 31, 1990 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress, known for The Wave (2008), Zurich (2013) and Romeos (2011).
biography.name: Liv Lisa Fries

biography.bio: Ferenc Graefe was born in 1984. He is an actor and art director, known for Meier Müller Schmidt (2015), Fünf Sterne (2005) and Sabine!! (2004).
biography.name: Ferenc Graefe
